Docs.summary: Represents a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> property. Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. If you manually instantiate this class, call <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.BeginInit%2A> before you set the first property of the object and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.EndInit%2A> after you set the last property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.
Docs.value: The name of the category to which this property belongs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Category%2A> element that is defined in the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> class, a default <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Category%2A> that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> class.
This field is optional and is culture-invariant. When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). This field cannot be set to the empty string.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data source where the current value of this property is stored.
Docs.value: The data source where the current value of this property is stored.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the data source is defined, it overrides the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.DataSource%2A> property on the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule>.
This field is mandatory only if the parent <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> does not have the data source initialized. The getter for this property returns only the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.DataSource%2A> that is set directly on this <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> instance.

This field is optional. If this property, together with <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A>, is specified, then the value of <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpUrl%2A> is ignored.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property has a higher priority than the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpContext%2A>+<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A> properties. In other words, these properties are ignored if <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpUrl%2A> is set.
This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.
Docs.value: The hint to the command-line constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.
